definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: Today’s scandal-a-month journalism has clearly gotten out of control.
sentences.chinese: 今天，“醜聞月月有”的新聞工作顯然已經失控。

sentences.english: The cowboy caught the runaway horse with a rope.
sentences.chinese: 那個牛仔用套索套住了那匹失控的脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: Particularly in the News of the World, this was a newsroom out of control.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是《世界新聞報》，那裏的新聞編輯室已經失控。

sentences.english: I put full regular and full right rudder in to try and keep the plane from spinning out of control.
sentences.chinese: 我把方向舵全打向右邊，試圖結束飛機的失控。

sentences.english: The radiator is out of control because of its long working hours.
sentences.chinese: 由於工作太長時間了，這個暖氣片已經失控了。

sentences.english: For many drivers, there is something fundamentally terrifying about a car that accelerates uncontrollably.
sentences.chinese: 對許多司機來說，油門失控是一件極其可怕的事情。

sentences.english: My car suddenly spun out and crashed into a tree.
sentences.chinese: 我的車子突然間打滑失控，撞上了一棵樹。

sentences.english: The assembly went out of control and became a scene of turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 場面失控了，變得雞飛狗跳，一片混亂。

sentences.english: Where supreme adaptability is required, out-of-control swarmware is what you want.
sentences.chinese: 在需要終極適應性的地方，你所需要的是失控的羣件。

sentences.english: They voiced concerns about security and the threat of off-campus lifestyles getting out of control.
sentences.chinese: 他們表示關切和對安全的威脅關閉校園生活失控。

sentences.english: In Standard Poodles , for example, size is getting out of control.
sentences.chinese: 比方說，在標準貴賓犬中，大小的問題已經趨於失控。

sentences.english: You can turn off long-running script detection by selecting Disable Runaway JavaScript Timer under the Develop menu.
sentences.chinese: 在Safari中，可以關閉失控腳本的檢測功能。

sentences.english: I often feel reckless and out of control when I shop.
sentences.chinese: 在我購物的時候，我經常有不顧一切和失控的感覺。

sentences.english: Out-of-control sovereign debt is what plunged Greece into crisis.
sentences.chinese: 主權債務失控是導致希臘陷入危機的原因。

sentences.english: Dysregulation in development and growth is the hallmark of human cardiovascular diseases.
sentences.chinese: 發育和增長失控是人類心血管疾病的主要特點。

sentences.english: Some fans lost control of their tempers and threw foam fingers onto the court.
sentences.chinese: 竟然就有球迷情緒失控丟擲加油器具進場。

definition: out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
to crash (into another car)/(fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash/(of subject matter) to be the same
to have an accident/to meet with a mishap
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
to lose one's head out of fear (idiom)
crash/breakdown (of social values etc)/burst/to crumble/to collapse
to collide/jerking motion/to impinge/to offend/to provoke
out of control/berserk/to go for a long walk
